442348.trustfund:
TF027147-PHRD-PRIVATIZATION SUPPORT PROJECT,TF037721-ECA REGION - TELECOMMUNICATIONS,TF036770-MOROCCO - TELECOM ADJUSTMENT
            LOAN PROJECT,TF036039-ECA REGION - ECA BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT

repnme.cdata!:
Morocco - Telecommunications, Post and
            Information Technology Sector Adjustment Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The assessment of outcome is highly
            satisfactory, sustainability likely, and, institutional
            development impacts are high. Lessons highlight the valuable
            project design, an experience integrating
            telecommunications, information technology, and postal
            components into a single operation, encouraging the
            Government to broadly view information infrastructure in the
            context of effective information for development, and global
            convergence. Moreover, the realistic design appropriately
            reflected the differences in institutional capabilities, and
            political will, such as high expectations for
            telecommunications, modest for the postal component, and
            fragmentary for information technology. And, and important
            factor was the introduction of competition, prior to
            privatizing the incumbent telecommunications operator,
            Itissalat Al-Maghrib (IAM). This accelerated service
            roll-out, reduced prices, and strengthened commercial
            management; the successful Global System for Mobile
            Communications (GSM) tender, accelerated IAM privatization;
            and, market competition prior to privatization, limited the
            risk that IAM's monopoly privileges, would be extended
            in an attempt to increase the sale price. Finally,
            competition for, and in Morocco's markets has resulted
            in rapid build-up of new networks, reducing the incremental
            cost of rural service provision, and made new service
            modalities, affordable to modest urban users.

5086070.trustfund:
TF036039-ECA REGION - ECA BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT,TF027147-PHRD-PRIVATIZATION SUPPORT PROJECT,TF037721-ECA REGION - TELECOMMUNICATIONS,TF036770-MOROCCO - TELECOM ADJUSTMENT
            LOAN PROJECT
5086070.majtheme: Public sector governance,Financial and private sector development,Rule of law

repnme.cdata!:
Morocco - Telecommunications, Post, and
            Information Technology Sector Adjustment Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Telecommunications, Post, and
            Information Technology Sector Adjustment Project, will
            provide comprehensive competitive reforms in the sector,
            adopting measures for telecommunications liberalization,
            regulation, and privatization. Accessibility to
            telecommunications services by the poor, particularly in
            rural areas, will be supported. To facilitate Morocco's
            transition to a global, information-based economy, a
            national information technology strategy will be developed.
            The project seeks to increase the postal services
            competitiveness, ensuring public service obligations are not
            only met, but adequately defined and financed. The private
            sector will be a major beneficiary of competitive
            telecommunications, post, and information technology
            services, since the service industry accounts for
            increasingly higher shares of GDP in developing economies.
            However, the reversal of key policy measures, such as the
            introduction of competition in the telecommunications
            sector, or the strengthening of the regulator's
            autonomy, may pose serious risks to an already complex operation.
